page.title: 15NEIGHBOURHOOD WATCH
page.content: My brother and myself generally do not get on very well,but I think the main cause of that is because I have the smallest bedroom.My parents get on with all our neighbours and my mum freqently writes to one of her closest friends who at the moment is living in Kenya.In the road that I live in,many parents have set up a Neighbourhood Watch Scheme to try and prevent local burglaries.My Dad goes to special meetings held by the Metropolitan police about the Neighbourhood Watch Scheme.These are normaly held at Bishop Ramsay school on friday evenings.Across the road from where I live is a house that is rented by college graduates.No-one really gets on with them because they park their cars infront of everybodys houses and sometimes their driveways.
